com.simiacryptus.mindseye.opt.orient

Interface OrientationStrategy<T extends LineSearchCursor>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type parameter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DescribeOrientationWrapper, GradientDescent, LayerReweightingStrategy, LayerReweightingStrategy.HashMapLayerReweightingStrategy, LayerTrustRegionMap, LBFGS, MomentumStrategy, OwlQn, QQN, QuantifyOrientationWrapper, RecursiveSubspace, TrustRegionStrategy, ValidatingOrientationWrapper

    public interface OrientationStrategy<T extends LineSearchCursor>
    Base class for the "orientation" optimization sub-component. This class interprets the result of the differential function evaluation result at the start of a training iteration, transforming the multi-dimensional point-vector-function entity into a one-dimensional search sub-problem.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods
